member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.AddParty(MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Models.AddPartyMember)
member.summary: "CREATE Operation" Assigns a Genshin Impact character to a player.
member.returns: a JSON object of the current Genshin party.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.GetCurrentParty
member.summary: "READ Operation" Retrieves current Genshin Impact characters and information assigned to the identified player.
member.returns: a JSON object of the player's Genshin character and their information.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.UpdateCurrentTeam(System.Guid,MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Models.UpdatePartyMember)
member.summary: "UPDATE Operation" Change the player's name or their assigned character.
member.returns: a JSON object of the updated genshin character.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.OfficialAPI.Controllers.GenshinTeamController.GetGenshinCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves specific character from the Genshin API, retrieving their name, vision, weapon, nation and description
member.returns: A JSON object of the genshin character
